title: Assets in the remote module

code_examples.context: You can customize assets connected via an incoming property more flexibly thanCDNorBase64assets connected directly . If incoming properties are provided, interact with them via theCrtInputdecorator. I
Connect the font in theindex.htmlcomponent file.
Connect the font in thesrcproperty of the*.component.scssfile.

code_examples.code: p {    font-family: "Menlo", cursive;    color: green;    font-size: 36px;}
code_examples.context: Apply the font in the*.component.htmlfile.

code_examples.code: private _fontFamily!: string;private _fontSrc!: string;@CrtInput()@Input()public set fontConfig(config: { fontFamily: string; fontSrc: string}) {    if (Boolean(config)) {        this._fontFamily = config.fontFamily;        this._fontSrc = config.fontSrc;        const font = new FontFace(this._fontFamily, 'url(${this._fontSrc})');        font.load().then(() => {            this._renderrer.setStyle(                document.querySelector('p'),                'fontFamily',                this._fontFamily            );        });    }}
code_examples.context: Implement the business logic that installs and loads a custom font.
